p: In the status-neutral MOH scenario, personnel costs were considerably lower largely due to the assumed use of group rather than individual counseling. The average cost of distributing an HIVST kit to a pregnant woman, regardless of her HIV status, was $3.70 ( Table 1). The average cost of clinic linkage for HIV testing for a male partner who self-tested positive was $6.65 per male ( Table 2). We assumed men in this scenario were not provided travel reimbursements for testing at the clinic. HIVST kits comprised the largest proportion of the cost (75.5%), followed by personnel (12.8%) ( Figure 1).
